name: protein
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 one of the many substances found in food such as meat, cheese, fish, or eggs, that is necessary for the body to grow and be strong
Examples
Vegans get all the protein they need from nuts, seeds, beans and cereals.Meat and fish are a vital source of protein.
